images.copyright: Aerial view of Galešnjak Island on the Adriatic coast of Croatia (© biggunsband/Shutterstock)
images.title: Spread some love with Bing
images.caption: Spread some love with Bing
images.desc: We hope this aerial view of Galešnjak, or Love Island, serves as inspiration to spread some love today via our newest feature: Give Mode. When you switch to Give Mode on Bing, your Bing searches will earn Microsoft Rewards points that automatically benefit your nonprofit of choice. Pick from more than 1 million charities, including those responding to the new coronavirus in the US and abroad. Your cause will get real monetary donations, and Microsoft will match them through June. What’s not to love?
